Specimen Type: Genomic DNA extracted from patient samples (specimen type varies)
Purpose: To detect and report clinically significant genetic variants associated with B-cell lymphoma using high-depth next-generation sequencing.
Container: Varies (depends on original specimen prior to DNA extraction)
Equipment: Spectrophotometer, sonicator, PCR thermal cycler, magnetic bead cleanup system, Agilent Bioanalyzer, Illumina sequencing platform
